title: Any Ping Check tool or similar
body:
well my week has not been the best and in 5 days Laptop Headphones and iPhone broken I am quite pissed off, the last thing i want is be insulted on a videogame.

I play Just normal Games because i know that i'm not very good... To avoid to be a pain in the butt for someone else I try on my own the very best i can, Beside the bad performance I never AFKed, I never Quit the game and I never flames Enemies or Teammates especially when i Do Good.

So many times happen that i have to Fill the last spot and the role that i'm used Jungler or Mid laner is not available so covering top or Carry bot is pretty hard for me.. (sure can learn but i usually perform bad).

So people rush to occupy those roles and pretend, roles they basically gave to you, you DO GOOD.
Well it's not working like that. I have to follow my Runes unfortunately with this thing about Buying for 6300 IP the rune page I have few Pages not covering all the roles and my Champ Select Depends from the Runes.

As support I have to play a Mage because i have AP runes as Jungler I can play Udyr but I can't play RekSai.
As Ad Carry I can play Teemo but i can't play Jinx.
So fore so fore.. so fore... 

PLUS
I have a metered connection and it is a Wi Fi (similar to those ones in Universities).
Now my problem is that the Modem is shared with 20 or 25 persons and in Peak time, often when the data is restored and the meter is reset, My connection is very weak and i have ping around 200 with spikes to 500 up to 1200...
vast majority my ping is 25 to 65. 

Today with a community of 60 million people there's no a way to test your ping before to go in game.

Yeah i know there is the Prompt test from windows but it's Not official and is not in the client i'm not testing every time before to start a game.

So my request There is any way to test my ping on OCE server ? easy way ?

replies.body:
I check my ping by opening Command Prompt (cmd) and type in something such as

ping oce.leagueoflegends.com -t

If that's not enough, I go into a custom game, and check the ping there. Also good for cs practice or whatever.
